local_intent: Confirm the T-block is perceived, align to it, set yaw to 90, move to the contact pose t_block_contact, and verify arrival.
assumptions: Pose label t_block_contact is predefined and reachable
Yaw 90 deg is the correct pushing orientation
A single scan is sufficient if the block is not initially visible
coherence_with_global: Mirrors the global sequence around ApproachAndAlign, SetTCPYaw(90), and MoveTo(t_block_contact); includes perception fallback for the block and verifies arrival with IsAt.
